LanguageData.GR_GeneticExtractionTable.label: стол генетической экстракции
LanguageData.GR_GeneticExtractionTable_Frame.label: genetic extraction table (building)
LanguageData.GR_GenePod.label: генный бак
LanguageData.GR_GenePod.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory.
LanguageData.GR_GenePod_Blueprint.label: genepod (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_GenePod_Blueprint_Install.label: genepod (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_GenePod_Frame.label: genepod (building)
LanguageData.GR_GenePod_Frame.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory.
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod.label: продвинутый генный бак
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory. The vats of growth compound accelerate some of the most difficult experiments.
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod_Blueprint.label: advanced genepod (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod_Frame.label: advanced genepod (building)
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod_Frame.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory. The vats of growth compound accelerate some of the most difficult experiments.
LanguageData.GR_Pulper.label: измельчитель
LanguageData.GR_Pulper.description: Turns wood and organic resources into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_Pulper_Blueprint.label: pulper (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_Pulper_Blueprint_Install.label: pulper (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_Pulper_Frame.label: pulper (building)
LanguageData.GR_Pulper_Frame.description: Turns wood and organic resources into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler.label: утилизатор
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler.description: Turns corpses into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler_Blueprint.label: recycler (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler_Blueprint_Install.label: recycler (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler_Frame.label: recycler (building)
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler_Frame.description: Turns corpses into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator.label: рекомбинатор генов
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator.description: Mixes genes from different species, and produces genes from other species at random. Or not. Also, be careful, you don't want to mix frogs with other things. Life finds a way.
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator_Blueprint.label: gene recombinator (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator_Frame.label: gene recombinator (building)
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator_Frame.description: Mixes genes from different species, and produces genes from other species at random. Or not. Also, be careful, you don't want to mix frogs with other things. Life finds a way.
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat.label: чан клонирования
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat.description: Accelerates growth of organic structures, allowing accelerated development of genetically manipulated hybrid implants. This building is used for both hybrid animal implants and humanoid implants.
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat_Blueprint.label: tissue growing vat (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat_Frame.label: tissue growing vat (building)
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat_Frame.description: Accelerates growth of organic structures, allowing accelerated development of genetically manipulated hybrid implants. This building is used for both hybrid animal implants and humanoid implants.
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator.label: дубликатор генов
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator.description: This advanced machine can be used to grow and duplicate almost any kind of genetic material. It consumes a large amount of organic pulp and most of it is wasted on the process. Also, tt won't work on Thrumbo and Mechanoid genes.
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator_Blueprint.label: gene duplicator (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator_Frame.label: gene duplicator (building)
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator_Frame.description: This advanced machine can be used to grow and duplicate almost any kind of genetic material. It consumes a large amount of organic pulp and most of it is wasted on the process. Also, tt won't work on Thrumbo and Mechanoid genes.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable.label: стол экстракции образцовой сыворотки
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable.description: This worktable allows you to refine animal genes and extract a concentrated essence called paragon serum, which can be used to raise more evolved versions of your animals in the animal enrichment center.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable_Frame.label: paragon serum extraction table (building)
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable_Frame.descr: This worktable allows you to refine animal genes and extract a concentrated essence called paragon serum, which can be used to raise more evolved versions of your animals in the animal enrichment center.
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter.label: центр улучшения животных
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter.description: This machine can fill an incubator with specific paragon serum and an organic base compound to create advanced versions of your base creatures.
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter_Frame.label: animal enrichment center (building)
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter_Frame.descript: This machine can fill an incubator with specific paragon serum and an organic base compound to create advanced versions of your base creatures.
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench.label: машина генномодификаторов
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench.description: The Genetrainer bench allows jury rigging of mech serum neurotrainers, healers and resurrectors to craft genetrainers, single use artifacts that inject animal genetic material in a human being, acting as a powerful implant that doesn't take the place of any organ in the body.
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench_Blueprint.label: genetrainer bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench_Frame.label: genetrainer bench (building)
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench_Frame.description: The Genetrainer bench allows jury rigging of mech serum neurotrainers, healers and resurrectors to craft genetrainers, single use artifacts that inject animal genetic material in a human being, acting as a powerful implant that doesn't take the place of any organ in the body.
